name: reincorporate
content:
reincorporate verb
(INCLUDE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to make something part of something larger again after a period when it was not part of that thing: The province was later reincorporated into the empire. After the Civil War the southern states were reincorporated into the Union.
More examplesFewer examplesShe decided to reincorporate the discarded paragraph into her speech.The emblem has been re-incorporated into the national flag.

reincorporate verb
(BUSINESS)
[ I or T ]
  business
  specialized of a business, to close down and start up again as a new organization; to close a business in this way: Some of the airlines will reincorporate in other countries. The original firm was re-incorporated in 1903 as the Ford Motor Company.
More examplesFewer examplesThe firm plans to reincorporate under a new name.The company reincorporated in Delaware in 1995.
